title: Remove AI-powered summarization code
description:
Remove the unused AI/OpenAI integration. It's not implemented as a feature and just adds clutter and unnecessary attack surface.

Remove:
- `/ai` endpoint and handler
- OpenAI SDK dependency
- OPENAI_API_KEY from .env.sample
- Any AI-related imports/config

title: Fix 17 GitHub/Dependabot vulnerabilities
description: GitHub reported 17 vulnerabilities on the default branch: 1 critical, 6 high, 4 moderate, 6 low. See https://github.com/yngvark/bank-transactions-summarizer/security/dependabot
notes: Make sure not to use the very latest release dependencies. We have to have at least a week of minimum release age. I think you can use Dependabot's cooldown feature for that, but research it.

title: Run make in project root
description: I want to be able to run 'make run' in the project root dir. It should run the solution and opening it in my browser automatically

title: Table columns not fully visible
description: Some columns in the data table are cut off or hidden, preventing users from seeing all transaction data.
acceptance_criteria:
- All table columns are visible without horizontal scrolling issues
- Column headers are fully readable
- Data in each column is not truncated unexpectedly
notes:
Don't use Playwright for this issue. The context gets too large. Currently the problem is that the horizontal scroller makes January to November visible, but nothing after.

Also use git status to see current work on this issue.

title: Convert V1 to V2 architecture
description: Refactor V1 codebase to V2 structure: TypeScript backend, React+Vite frontend. No new features, just architecture conversion.

title: Convert frontend to React components
description: Convert uploader, renderer, statistics, parser to React + TypeScript

title: Default to random port for dev server
Set up V2 frontend (React + Vite + TypeScript)
description: Create v2/frontend/ with Vite, React, TypeScript configuration

title: Support dynamic port for parallel development
description: The dev server always runs on port 5173, preventing parallel work. Need to support PORT env variable so multiple instances can run simultaneously.

title: Update CategoryMapping type to support variable-length arrays
description: Change CategoryMapping values from [string, string] to string[] to support unlimited category depth
acceptance_criteria:
- CategoryMapping type updated in shared/types
- Existing categories.json still works
- TypeScript compiles without errors
close_reason: Updated CategoryMapping from [string, string] to string[] and changed parser to use join() instead of hardcoded indices

title: Move Makefile from v2/ to repository root
description: Move v2/Makefile to the repository root for easier access. Update paths in Makefile targets as needed.

title: Verify V2 works same as V1
description: Test that V2 has feature parity with V1

title: Add category truncation utility function
description: Create utility function that truncates a category path array to N levels. E.g., ['Mat', 'Dagligvarer', 'Rema'] at depth 2 becomes ['Mat', 'Dagligvarer']
acceptance_criteria:
- Function truncateCategoryPath(path: string[], depth: number): string[]
- Returns original if depth >= path.length
- Unit tests pass

title: Convert backend routes to TypeScript
description: Convert categories, files, ai routes from JS to TypeScript

title: Set up V2 backend structure (TypeScript + Express)
description: Create v2/backend/ with package.json, tsconfig.json, Express setup

title: Update statistics calculation to support dynamic depth aggregation
description: Modify calculateStatistics to accept a depth parameter and aggregate categories at that depth. When depth < max, multiple transactions roll up into parent categories.
acceptance_criteria:
- calculateStatistics accepts depth parameter
- Amounts correctly sum when aggregating
- Existing behavior preserved when depth = max

title: Architect a solution for v2
description: Read through code for v1. Figure out what's working and what is not working. Create a proposal for a v2 of the solution. It should just be a description of the solution and its architecture, in markdown format.

title: Update parser to store category as array instead of arrow-joined string
description: Change getCategoryFromMapping to return the category array directly instead of joining with arrow. The display formatting should happen in the UI layer.
acceptance_criteria:
- Transaction.Category becomes string[] type
- Parser returns array from mapping
- Arrow joining moved to display layer

title: Sample data should include 12 months of transactions
description: When clicking "Load sample data", the app only shows January to April 2023. Should show a full 12 months of data for better demonstration.

title: Zip V1 directory and remove it
description: The V1 directory is no longer needed. Archive it as a zip file and delete the directory.

title: Make ready for version 2
description: Make prepearations for v2 of this solution. Put all code in a new dir, v1. Then create a new empty dir, v2.

title: Remove backend - make frontend-only app
description:
The backend is scaffolding for features that don't exist. Remove it entirely.

Current backend does:
- Serve pre-configured transactions.xlsx (user can upload instead)
- Serve categories.json (bundle in frontend)
- AI test endpoint (being removed separately)

Changes needed:
- Delete v2/backend directory
- Bundle categories.json in frontend
- Update any frontend API calls to use bundled data
- Update build/run scripts
- Update documentation

title: Add depth selector UI component
description: Create a UI control (slider or +/- buttons) that lets users select the category display depth from 0 to max depth in the data.
acceptance_criteria:
- Component shows current depth level
- User can increase/decrease depth
- Depth constrained to valid range (0 to max)
- Clean, intuitive UI

title: Create shared types
description: Create v2/shared/types.ts with Transaction, Category, Statistics types

title: Update StatisticsTable to display hierarchical categories
description: Modify StatisticsTable to format category arrays with arrow separator and respond to depth changes. Categories should update when depth setting changes.
acceptance_criteria:
- Categories display as 'Level1 → Level2 → Level3'
- Table updates when depth changes
- Sorting works correctly
- Colors still apply correctly

title: Make buttons prettier
description: The buttons (Upload Excel File, Load Sample Data) could use visual improvements to better match the updated color palette. Consider adding hover effects, better styling, or more refined appearance.

title: Add drag-and-drop support for file upload
description: Add drag-and-drop functionality as an alternative to the file picker dialog. Users can drop Excel files directly onto the upload area instead of using the browser's file picker.
acceptance_criteria:
- Drop zone visually indicates when dragging over
- Accepts same file types as the upload button (.xlsx, .xls)
- Shows feedback on successful drop
- Falls back gracefully if drag-and-drop not supported
